name: Human Resources
description: Responsible for recruiting, screening, interviewing and placing workers.

name: Marketing
description: Focuses on promoting the business and mission of an organization.

name: IT Department
description: Responsible for the implementation and maintenance of the company's technology infrastructure.

name: Finance
description: Manages the company's finances, including budgeting, forecasting, and investment planning.

name: Research and Development
description: Focuses on developing new products and improving existing ones.

name: Customer Support
description: Provides assistance and support to the company's customers regarding their inquiries and issues.
